notifications.title: End of the month offer!
notifications.subtitle: At PakosRest we offer you a 60% discount for the purchase of a plate of food and an input.
notifications.content: The offer is only valid between September 10 to September 30, 2022. The offer is only granted to people who purchase a plate of food and at least one input in the same purchase.If you do not comply with any of the above points, the discount will not be applied.

notifications.title: Norky's has just published several supplies
notifications.subtitle: Norky's Restaurant published 4 new supplies.
notifications.content: The supplies are: - 1/8 grilled chicken - salad with vinaigrette - Hoop rice - 1 pork chop

notifications.title: Juanito's just posted a plate of food
notifications.subtitle: Juanito's published the dish: Steak a lo poor. Get it before it runs out.
